page.title: 15TRAFFIC IN DAISY HILL
page.content:
THERE HAS BEEN A LOT OF INTEREST IN THE{TRAFFIC SITUATION}IN DAISY HILL OVER THE LAST TWELVE MONTHS. ARTICLES HAVE APPEARED IN THE LOCAL NEWSPAPERS AND THE{POLICE}HAVE CONDUCTED TRAFFIC SURVEYS. WE DECIDED TO FIND OUT WHAT THE VIEWS ARE OF THE PEOPLE WHO LIVE IN DAISY HILL.
CHILDREN FROM OUR CLASS INTERVIEWED TWENTY THREE PEOPLE, SIXTEEN ADULTS AND SEVEN CHILDREN. WE NOTED DOWN WHAT{TYPE OF ROADUSERS}THEY WERE. SOME USED THE ROADS FOR{CYCLING AND {DRIVING CARS. }OTHERS WERE{PASSENGERS IN THE BACK OF CARS AND SOME WERE BUS PASSENGERS. ALL OF THEM, AT SOMETIME, WERE{PEDESTRIANS. }WE FOUND OUT FOR HOW MANY YEARS PEOPLE HAD BEEN USING THE ROADS IN DAISY HILL. (CONT P.16)
